guardian.title: Greek prime minister vows to strike deal to stay inside eurozone
guardian.topComment: Amidst all this panicking the Greek government seem to have the calmest heads.

guardian.title: Vladimir Putin's Egypt visit sends message to US
guardian.topComment: "Putin is expected to hold discussions about ending the use of the US dollar in bilateral trade between Egypt and Russia."

guardian.title: Beck's Grammy win is 'disrespectful'
guardian.topComment: What a wanker. It would have been nice if Beck had just kicked him in the bollocks.
